Doc: A type defining the adjusted payment date and associated calculation period parameters required to calculate the actual or projected payment amount. This type forms part of the cashflow representation of a swap stream.

Source.Contents:
/#
   A type defining the adjusted payment date and associated calculation period parameters required to calculate the actual or projected payment amount. This type forms part of the cashflow representation of a swap stream.
 #/
record FpML5.confirmation.PaymentCalculationPeriod {
  unadjustedPaymentDate : date?

  # The adjusted payment date. This date should already be adjusted for any applicable business day convention. This component is not intended for use in trade confirmation but may be specified to allow the fee structure to also serve as a cashflow type component (all dates the Cashflows type are adjusted payment dates).
  adjustedPaymentDate : date?

  # The parameters used in the calculation of a fixed or floating rate calculation period amount. A list of calculation period elements may be ordered in the document by ascending start date. An FpML document which contains an unordered list of calcularion periods is still regarded as a conformant document.
  calculationPeriod : FpML5.confirmation.CalculationPeriod

  # A known fixed payment amount.
  fixedPaymentAmount : decimal

  # A decimal value representing the discount factor used to calculate the present value of cash flow.
  discountFactor : decimal?

  # A monetary amount representing the forecast of the future value of the payment.
  forecastPaymentAmount : FpML5.confirmation.Money?

  # A monetary amount representing the present value of the forecast payment.
  presentValueAmount : FpML5.confirmation.Money?

  id : string?

  href : string?

}

adjustedPaymentDate.Doc: The adjusted payment date. This date should already be adjusted for any applicable business day convention. This component is not intended for use in trade confirmation but may be specified to allow the fee structure to also serve as a cashflow type component (all dates the Cashflows type are adjusted payment dates).
adjustedPaymentDate.Name: adjustedPaymentDate

calculationPeriod.Doc: The parameters used in the calculation of a fixed or floating rate calculation period amount. A list of calculation period elements may be ordered in the document by ascending start date. An FpML document which contains an unordered list of calcularion periods is still regarded as a conformant document.
calculationPeriod.Name: calculationPeriod

discountFactor.Doc: A decimal value representing the discount factor used to calculate the present value of cash flow.
discountFactor.Name: discountFactor

forecastPaymentAmount.Doc: A monetary amount representing the forecast of the future value of the payment.
forecastPaymentAmount.Name: forecastPaymentAmount

presentValueAmount.Doc: A monetary amount representing the present value of the forecast payment.
presentValueAmount.Name: presentValueAmount
